name: Treevenge (TwoSticks)
description:
You are a lumberjack who is trying to gather wood in order to build a small cabin for yourself. But beware: at night, the plants will come back for revenge!

Treevenge is TURN BASED. Time will move when you move. Take your time!

The original music fades between day and night themes depending on the time of day.

INSTRUCTIONS
Use arrow keys or WASD to move
Bump into trees or the mushroom to cut them
Cutting trees will drop wood. Collect as much of it as you can.

TREES
At night, the trees will get revenge!
If you are next to a stump two turns in a row it will kill you

THE MUSHROOM
Every morning, the mushroom will grow.
Chop the mushroom once before dawn, or it will explode

Protip: You can press multiple buttons at the same time to walk or chop twice in the same turn

Made by three people in over 3 hours for Trijam #164
Programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3.
Artwork was drawn by K. Haine using Scratch vector v3.
Music was composed by P. Haine using Logic Pro. Sound effects were edited in Audacity. Some sounds came from freesound.org
